messages.messageBody:
>
>
> With close friends and family I am more likely to follow the adage,
> "Let your life speak for itself."
>
> Laura, that is really nice....
> I think I need to engrave that someplace, or paint it on many of my
> walls. That is so true, but hard to remind oneself of... Thanks, Ann
>
A friend of my mum's once painted, in bright red gloss paint 'Don't
let the b******s grind you down!' on her living room wall. I think she
was going through a tough time...

Tracy

messages.messageBody:
With close friends and family I am more likely to follow the adage, "Let your
life speak for itself."

Laura, that is really nice....
I think I need to engrave that someplace, or paint it on many of my walls.  That is so true, but hard to remind oneself of...
Thanks,
Ann
